name: Grooblins!
description:
take care of your GROOBLIN and it's friends in this  tamagotchi-like!

Discover the SECRETS that the GROOBLINS hold!

made in a hectic 72hr for #LD40! 

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/40/grooblins

programming / art / writing : Russell Sullivan @ahintoflime
writing / animation / sound: Bond Miller

enjoy! :)
